directions: Toss cucumbers, carrots, yellow bell pepper, red bell pepper, and red onion together in a bowl.
Scatter lemon zest over the cucumber mixture. Squeeze lemon juice over the salad and toss to coat.
Chill completely in refrigerator to serve.
ingredients: 1 large yellow bell pepper, seeded and cut into strips
1 large red bell pepper, seeded and cut into strips
title: Fresh and Crisp Cucumber Salad
